title: Resume & CV
text:
Resume
View and download a pdf of my latest resume on github. This was created in LaTeX using a modified version of the Awesome CV template.


Professional Talks
Kloet, J. (2023). I Am A Data Scientist, And So Can You!. Erdos Institute Invitation to Industry 2023 Fall Speakers Series.
Kloet, J. (2022). Garbage Data, And What To Do About Them. RStudio::conf(2022).
Kloet, J. (2020). Mapping 311 Requests In Chicago With Shiny, Leaflet, and plotly. UseR! 2020 Virtual Conference.


Peer-Reviewed Publications & Presentations
I used to do research on learning, language, and personality. You can check out my peer-reviewed publications on Google Scholar.

title: Test Post
text: This is a test post. Neato!

title: Projects
text: Here’s some stuff I work on when I’m not working for the man.

title: Projects
text:
Active Projects

Slam Dunk Betting Services
My partners and I developed machine learning and artificial intelligence tools to predict the outcomes of events in NBA games and identify plays that are +EV. We’ve been doing this since gambling was legalized in Illinois, and recently opened up our tools to subscribers.


DopeGenerativeArt
I was initially inspired to make generative art in ggplot2 by the work of Antonio Sánchez Chinchón and I opened up an Etsy shop to peddle my wares.


Music
I sell music gear, so far only amps and guitars, on Reverb. If you have sparkly guitars or basses that you’re willing to sell or trade, LET ME KNOW.
I also play and produce music, but I don’t record it very often. Here’s one representative example of my singer-songwritering.

title: Projects
text:
Archived & Privatized Projects

chi311dash
Archived I live in Chicago, which has a public data portal of interesting information, including 311 requests. So I built a repo to grab 311 request data and plot it on a map of Chicago broken down by neighborhoods.


betfinder
Privatized behind Slam Dunk Sports data is what got me interested in data science. betfinder is a repo with functions for extracting selected wager info from selected sports books.


gambling_dashboards
Privatized behind Slam Dunk A repo with a single shiny dashboard surfacing some of the insights from betfinder’s automated production runs.

title: Hello! I’m Jim
text:
This is the personal website for Jim Kloet (Kloet rhymes with flute). I live with my family in Chicago, where I work as a data person trying to help folks make better decisions. I also make music, visual art, software, and occasionally write about stuff.
Thanks for visiting!

title: Blog
text:
This is where stuff I’ve written lives. I don’t know that I can call this a blog anymore - do people even still say blog? - given my infrequent posting habits, but we’ll see if that changes.

Jim Kloet
